Add Popular page showing most-clicked movies in app

title: Create PopularController with index action
description: Query movie_clicks grouped by tmdb_movie_id, ordered by click count descending. Join with movies table to get poster/title data.

title: Add Load More pagination to homepage trending movies
description: Replace fixed 20-movie grid with paginated loading using HTMX. Users click Load More button to fetch next page from TMDB trending endpoint. Cache each page separately. Fetch click counts per batch.

title: Update sidebar Popular link to /popular route
description: Change href from # to route('popular.index') in heatmap layout.

title: Create popular.index Blade view
description: Display popular movies in a grid similar to homepage. Show click count on each card.

title: Add visual regression tests to Playwright
description: Set up Playwright visual regression testing infrastructure. This includes configuring snapshot testing, creating helper utilities for masking dynamic content (movie posters, timestamps, click counts), and establishing the baseline workflow. Child tasks will create specific screenshot tests.

title: Smart Movie Search with Auto-Population
description: Implement search functionality with local-first search, TMDB fallback, auto-persistence, HTMX-powered UI with native popover, infinite scroll, and add-to-grid with highlight animation.

title: Create movies table migration & Movie model
description: Create movies table with unique tmdb_id constraint. Fields: id, tmdb_id (unique), title (indexed), poster_path, backdrop_path, overview, release_date, vote_average, source enum (trending/search), timestamps. Include factory.

title: Playwright E2E tests for search flow
description: Test search input, popover appearance, result click adds to grid, scroll and highlight.

title: Install HTMX via npm and configure with Vite/CSRF
description: npm install htmx.org, import in app.js, configure CSRF token handling for HTMX requests.

title: Update HeatmapController to auto-seed trending movies to DB
description: Modify index() to upsert trending movies into movies table using updateOrCreate on tmdb_id. Source: trending.

title: Add searchMovies method to TmdbService
description: Query TMDB /search/movie endpoint, cache for 5 minutes, return transformed collection.

title: Create SearchController with Blade fragment responses
description: GET /search?q={query} endpoint. Search local movies first, fallback to TMDB if < threshold, persist new movies, return Blade fragment for HTMX.

title: Create reusable Blade partials for search and movie cards
description: Extract movie-card partial, create search-results partial with infinite scroll trigger.

title: Update index.blade.php with HTMX search and native popover
description: Add HTMX attributes to search input, native popover for results dropdown, debounced search trigger.

title: Implement add-to-grid with scroll and highlight animation
description: When search result clicked: close popover, prepend movie to grid, smooth scroll, 2-second cyan glow animation.

title: Feature tests for search functionality
description: Test local search, TMDB fallback, movie persistence, deduplication, empty results.

title: Add Pest tests for PopularController
description: Test that popular page loads, displays movies ordered by click count, handles empty state.

Create TmdbService for API abstraction
description: Create a TmdbService class that encapsulates all TMDB API calls. Should use Bearer token auth and provide methods for: getTrendingMovies(), getMovieDetails(). Cache responses appropriately.

title: Migration for movie_clicks table
description: Create migration for movie_clicks table tracking: id, ip_address (indexed), tmdb_movie_id, movie_title, poster_path, clicked_at timestamp. Use request()->ip() as identifier per project rules.

title: Controller logic for logging views and aggregating heatmap data
description: Create HeatmapController with: index() to show trending movies with heatmap overlay, logClick() to record movie clicks, getRecentViews() for sidebar data. Use IP-based identification.

title: Neon-Futuristic Blade layout
description: Create Blade views matching .agent-assets/design-inspiration.webp aesthetic: dark background (#1a1a2e or similar), neon accent colors, rounded poster cards with glow effects, left sidebar navigation, horizontal scrolling movie grids. Use Tailwind CSS 4.

title: Playwright test for Recent Views sidebar
description: Create Pest 4 browser test that verifies: clicking a movie poster logs the click, the Recent Views sidebar updates instantly to show the clicked movie. This establishes baseline for visual regression.
